chart_description: This chart displays the amount of network bandwidth utilized by the NIC (Network Interface Card) on a Windows system. The bandwidth is measured in kilobits per second (kbps). The chart shows two dimensions, 'received' and 'sent', indicating the amount of data received and sent by the NIC.

dimension_descriptions.received: This dimension displays the amount of data received by the NIC in kilobits per second (kbps).
dimension_descriptions.sent: This dimension displays the amount of data sent by the NIC in kilobits per second (kbps).
